```{r}
#| label: setup
library(tidyverse)
library(mlbench)
library(gtExtras)
```

```{r}
data("PimaIndiansDiabetes", package = "mlbench")


glm(diabetes ~ glucose,
  data = PimaIndiansDiabetes,
  family = binomial
) |>
  summary()
```

```{r}
PimaIndiansDiabetes |>
  head(10) |>
  gt() |>
  gt_theme_pff() |>
  tab_header(
    title = "PimaIndiansDiabetes Dataset"
  ) |>
  data_color(
    columns = diabetes,
    colors = scales::col_factor(
      palette = c("#f5c5bd", "#cbf5bd"),
      domain = c("neg", "pos")
    )
  )
```

```{r}
age_data <- PimaIndiansDiabetes |>
  mutate(age_group = case_when(
    age < 30 ~ "Young adult",
    age <= 50 ~ "Middle-aged",
    TRUE ~ "Older adult"
  )) |>
  mutate(age_group = factor(age_group, levels = c("Young adult", "Middle-aged", "Older adult"))) |>
  select(age_group, diabetes)
```

```{r}
model_2 <- glm(diabetes ~ age_group,
  data = age_data,
  family = binomial
)

summary(model_2)
```

```{r}
# 加载必要的包
library(ggplot2)

# 创建示例数据
set.seed(123) # 设置随机种子以确保结果可重复
x <- rnorm(100) # 生成100个随机数作为x轴数据
y <- 2 * x + rnorm(100) # 生成与x相关的y轴数据，并加入一些噪声

# 创建数据框
data <- data.frame(x = x, y = y)

# 使用ggplot2绘制散点图
ggplot(data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  # 设置点的颜色、大小和透明度
  geom_point(color = "blue", size = 3, alpha = 0.6) +
  # 添加标题和轴标签
  labs(title = "散点图示例", x = "X轴", y = "Y轴") +
  theme_minimal() # 使用简洁的主题
```

```{r}
# 使用R内置的mtcars数据集
data(mtcars)

# 查看数据集的前几行
head(mtcars)

# 使用ggplot2绘制散点图
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point(color = "red", size = 3, alpha = 0.8) + # 设置点的颜色、大小和透明度
  labs(
    title = "车重 vs 燃油效率",
    x = "车重 (吨)",
    y = "每加仑行驶英里数 (mpg)"
  ) + # 添加标题和轴标签
  theme_minimal() # 使用简洁的主题
```

```{r}
model_3 <- glm(diabetes ~ glucose + age,
  data = PimaIndiansDiabetes,
  family = binomial
)

summary(model_3)
```

```{r}
mtcars |>
  ggplot(aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
model_4 <- glm(diabetes ~ glucose + age + glucose:age,
  data = PimaIndiansDiabetes,
  family = binomial
)

summary(model_4)
```
